pages.text: The $(major)Wooly/$ Gene allows the entity to be $(minor)sheared for Wool/$. If a player has it, they can $(minor)shear themselves/$ by sneak right-clicking with Shears.$(br2)This has a configurable cooldown, with the default being 1 minute.$(br2)This Gene $(minor)can be given to mobs/$.
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br)$(li)Sheep
